definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
Cao Gangchuan (1935-), former artillery officer, senior PRC politician and army leader
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]

sentences.english: The former scene by dinosaur was more wonderful than human's.
sentences.chinese: 刚退场的恐龙戏码，就比我们精彩有趣得多了。

sentences.english: This is the new conveyor belt we had installed last year. We doubled our output in this department as result.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们刚安装的输送带，使我们的产量提高了两倍。

sentences.english: As she drove home, Mrs. Cox thought about the class she had just left.
sentences.chinese: 科克斯夫人在驱车回家的路上想着她刚上完的这节课。

sentences.english: In the first few years after I moved there, lotus flowers continued to blossom on the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 刚搬来的几年，池塘里还有荷花。

sentences.english: Have you ever walked into a room after people have been fighting?
sentences.chinese: 你曾走进人们刚争吵过之后的房间吗？

sentences.english: Director Zhang solved an intricate case soon after he took his post.
sentences.chinese: 局长刚上任不久就将一件无头案侦破了。

sentences.english: They have just put some pictures on a display board.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚把一些图片放到展览板上。

sentences.english: This is a Desert Wheatear for me, a fresh female.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这是一只刚换羽的漠即鸟母鸟。

sentences.english: Yes. We just had a basketball match with Class Two.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们刚跟二班进行了篮球比赛。

sentences.english: In the morning, as you begin to awaken, you are in a semiconscious.
sentences.chinese: 早晨你刚醒来时是处于一种半意识的状态中。

sentences.english: When you first start learning to drive a stick shift car, don't do it on any kind of a hill.
sentences.chinese: 当您刚开始学习驾驶手动挡时，千万别尝试任何坡道。

sentences.english: But at times, and especially at first, the brain does this work clumsily.
sentences.chinese: 但有时候，尤其是刚开始时，大脑并不擅长做这些。

sentences.english: He was howled away when stepping into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他刚一走进屋就被轻蔑的吼叫声轰了出来。

sentences.english: You may not be able to pay in cash for the things you need done.
sentences.chinese: 你刚开始可能没钱做想做的事情。

sentences.english: The ball he put over at the start of the second half at Hull was like Beckham in his prime.
sentences.chinese: 对赫尔城下半场刚开始他射进的入球像极了贝克汉姆。

sentences.english: Attempt to do me awake all the way, Xinxin Ran opened his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一切都像刚睡醒的样子，欣欣然张开了眼。

definition: to be just about to/to have just started to

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
